# 1. Check out the code
# 2. mvn clean install
# 3. cd to project's root directory
# 4. ./bin/setupRdfizer.sh (make sure you have write permission to / directory)
# 5. cd freebaseRDFizer
# 6. mvn exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="com.sj.freebase.data.rdf.DemoFreebaseRdfizer" -Dexec.args="<quad dump tsv file> <converted rdf file name>"
